alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 148 PM EDT/1248 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Mexico Beach to near Port St. Joe. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Tyndall Air Force Base, Overstreet, Highland View, Beacon Hill and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf
